org.decomposer.math
Interface EigenSpace

All Known Implementing Classes:
EigenSpaceImpl
public interface EigenSpace

Method Summary
 MapVector expand(MapVector documentVector, int numOutpuNonZeroEntries)
          essentially sparsify(uplift(project(documentVector)), numOutPutNumZeroEntries)
 MapVector project(MapVector documentVector)
          Take the input (sparse) document vector, and project onto the space spanned by the eigenvectors, normalized by 1/singularValue.
 MapVector sparsify(MapVector input, int numNonZeroEntries)
           
 MapVector uplift(MapVector projectedVector)
          Take an input (dense, but low-dimensional) projected vector, and (vector) sum the eigenvectors scaled by the projected vector's value at that eigen-index (again, suitably normalized by the singularValue).
 

Method Detail

project

MapVector project(MapVector documentVector)
Take the input (sparse) document vector, and project onto the space spanned by the eigenvectors, normalized by 1/singularValue.

Parameters:
documentVector -
Returns:
the projected vector, of dimension eigenVectors.size()

uplift

MapVector uplift(MapVector projectedVector)
Take an input (dense, but low-dimensional) projected vector, and (vector) sum the eigenvectors scaled by the projected vector's value at that eigen-index (again, suitably normalized by the singularValue).

Parameters:
projectedVector -
Returns:
dense vector of dimension eigenVectors.numCols()

sparsify

MapVector sparsify(MapVector input,
                   int numNonZeroEntries)
Parameters:
input -
numNonZeroEntries -
Returns:
a nearby sparse vector to the input with only numNonZeroEntries non-zero entries

expand

MapVector expand(MapVector documentVector,
                 int numOutpuNonZeroEntries)
essentially sparsify(uplift(project(documentVector)), numOutPutNumZeroEntries)

Parameters:
documentVector -
numOutpuNonZeroEntries -
Returns:
a sparsified uplift of the eigen-projection of the input document vector.
